pl_output:
`XDANGERNOODLE.BLOGGER` `xV0.5.3` | 1593997150454

Welcome to dangernoodle.blogger, the public blogger platform of Hackmud.

Here, for a measly 750GC, you can make your own post, whether it be news, talk, or
anything, even advertisements.

It can also be used to store advertisements, ascii art, or the like for your own
scripts or to use in chat.

Retrieving from the script is absolutely free, only inserting it costs the 750GC.

Use `Nnav`:`V"command"` to navigate, or run without {} to see latest posts. Run a command
to view the options for it.

`Vview` | `Vpost` | `Vdelete`
